That means there's no autofocus or image stabilisation, and the aperture is fixed at around f11. Your subjects will be in focus from 1.5 meters away up to infinity. The black mist element adds a subtle haze to the image with an attractive bloom effect to highlights. This haze adds a slight dreaminess to your images that helps soften the often oversharpened look prevalent in high-resolution digital files. I love this combination of effects in one filter and I've had my test unit sitting on the front of my camera pretty much the whole time since I got it.
